CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV , MOT and CHI enter the room . MOT puts CHI down on the floor in front of the toys . INV explains Warm-up Activity to MOT
MOT kneels down on floor beside CHI
MOT grabs jack+in+the+box and places it on the floor between CHI and herself
CHI grasps jack+in+the+box handle and begins to turn it
MOT holds the jack+in+the+box steady for CHI
CHI tries to turn the handle and then lets go of it
MOT watches CHI attempt to turn handle
CHI looks up at MOT and then down at the jack+in+the+box
MOT sings to the jack+in+the+box tune
<bef> MOT stops turning and lets go of handle
CHI tries to turn the handle and then lets go of it
CHI tries to turn the handle
MOT points to the handle in a downward/clockwise direction
CHI pulls her hand back away from the handle
MOT guides CHI's hand in clockwise direction as CHI tries to turn the handle
CHI tries to turn the handle again
clown pops up out of jack+in+the+box
<aft> MOT taps top of clown's head
CHI pushes clown's head down and closes the lid
lid does not remain closed when CHI takes her hands off of the jack+in+the+box
MOT puts clown back in jack+in+the+box and closes the lid tightly
<aft> CHI pushes clown back into box and tries to close lid
<aft> MOT helps CHI push clown back into box
MOT turns handle and pushes the lid down
CHI begins to turn handle again
CHI tries to turn handle and then lets go
MOT takes hold of handle and turns it
MOT sings rhythmically to the tune
CHI sways to the tune and with her right hand pretends to turn the handle
CHI starts to turn handle but then points to a book on the floor
MOT pushes book toward CHI with one hand and then slides jack+in+the+box off to the side with the other hand
CHI turns and looks at the jack+in+the+box and then turns back to face the book
MOT turns jack+in+the+box on the floor to face CHI
CHI turns around to look at jack+in+the+box
clown pops up out of the jack+in+the+box
MOT taps clowns head with her finger
MOT starts to push clown back down
CHI pushes clown back into box and attempts to close lid
lid does not stay down and the clown pops out again
CHI attempts to push clown down
CHI leans over to get the toy duck near MOT
<aft> CHI picks up duck and begins to squeeze it
MOT picks up the toy car and puts it in front of CHI
CHI squeezes duck in her hands
MOT squeezes duck and then places it on top of her head
CHI points to duck on MOT's head and rises off the floor
the duck falls off MOT's head
duck rolls down CHI's arm as it falls to the floor
CHI turns around looking for the duck
lifts up book lying on the floor and then takes football which is underneath the book and lays it in front of CHI
CHI turns around and looks at jack+in+the+box on the floor next to her
CHI attempts to push clown into box
CHI pushes the clown in the box

g.ga: put the clown back in the box

u.a: MOT helps CHI push clown down
CHI pushes clown back in jack+in+the+box and closes the lid
MOT pushes handle down in order to hold lid shut
CHI starts to turn handle again
MOT places her hand on handle and helps CHI to turn
MOT begins to turn handle quickly
singing rhythmically to the tune and laughing
CHI sways to the tune of the jack+in+the+box
CHI takes hold of the handle
MOT points to the handle indicating the direction in which she wants CHI to turn it
MOT puts her finger on top of CHI's hand and helps her push handle downward
CHI turns handle with MOT's help
CHI attempts to push clown back into box
CHI turns around on the floor looking at objects around the room
CHI closes the book and then opens it on the floor in front of her
MOT points to picture in book
CHI opens the book and begins to turn pages
CHI briefly looks at each page
MOT points to picture in book
CHI turns and looks at door
CHI stares at the door and then looks up at the wall
CHI looks up at picture on back wall
<bef> MOT follows CHI's gaze up to poster
CHI looks up at the wall
MOT gets up off of floor
MOT lifts CHI off the floor and holds her in front of the picture
MOT turns to look around room
MOT walks toward wall hanging on adjacent wall
camera makes noise as it moves
CHI turns and looks at camera
MOT turns and looks at camera and then looks briefly around the room
MOT points to poster of frog on wall
CHI looks up where MOT pointed
MOT turns and sees pictures on back wall
CHI is out of camera view

INV enters the room and explains Small Scale Activity to MOT . INV leaves room while Small Scale Activity takes place and re-enters at 12:58:33 . INV tells MOT about Forbidden Object task and her sit next to CHI at the table
INV takes Forbidden Object out of the drawer
CHI watches INV and looks at the object
CHI looks at the object and flutters her eyes
INV puts string of beads on table in front of CHI
CHI glances down at the beads
CHI looks up at INV and then down at the beads
<aft> INV passes her hand across the table in a sweeping motion
CHI fiddles with string of beads in her hands
CHI looks up at INV and smiles
CHI holds up the beads in front of her
CHI drops the beads on the table
CHI watches the beads as they drop to the table
CHI throws string of beads on to MOT's lap
string of beads falls off MOT's lap on to floor
CHI looks at string of beads on the floor
INV takes object off of table and puts back in desk drawer
INV explains four PCI boxes to MOT . MOt takes CHI out of the seat at the table and is holding her
MOT takes ball out of box on the desk
<aft> MOT kneels down on the floor
MOT puts CHI down on the floor
MOT sits on the floor across from CHI
MOT rolls the ball across the room to CHI
CHI points to ball as it rolls across the floor
<bef> CHI gets the ball and holds it
<bef> MOT rolls ball across the floor in another direction
CHI leans over ball and pulls it against her
MOT leans forward on her hands and knees
ball rolls out of CHI's hold
ball rolls out of CHI's hands
MOT reaches out to get ball
CHI watches ball roll across room
CHI picks up the ball and tries to throw it
the ball rolls out of CHI's arms and across room to back wall
MOT partially out of camera view
CHI tries to pick up the ball but then drops it
CHI pushes ball then crawls around on the floor following it
CHI is crawling across floor to table
<aft> MOT takes empty box out from underneath table and puts it on top of the table
MOT picks up ball and throws it in front of CHI who is underneath the table
CHI looks briefly at ball then looks under the table
CHI is partially out of camera view
